title: Nice Garden.. full of beautiful flowers
review: Municipal garden is about 2-3 kilometers from the mall road. You can take local paddle rickshaw for a ride to the garden. This is a picnic spot for locals. Beautiful Garden to spend some time and relax... green lawns,  nice nursery, flora and fauna,  water fall, ....

title: You can sacrifice this attraction for something that suits your taste
review: It is pity that people come to Mussoorie all the way from towns having desert, rivers, oceans but not mountains and valleys and then waste their time in an enclosed garden which can be found in any of the town. This garden offers no great views of Mountains and valley but has  few third class recreational facilities, a cheap wax museum with costly entry ticket and a few eateries including one central one. Someone who is on a short visit can skip this but may be if you are with kids you will be advised to visit here.

title: good family fun
review: good fun, a natural park and a clean place to visit .wax museum is great and fun rides for children, cheap option to enjoy and relax

title: Nice and Beautiful
review: This was the best place we visited in Mussoorie.  It had nice flower garden, fountain and food park.  Good for Children.  Lots of photographer will chase you for photos

title: We live the garden
review: I love the place is best place for enjoying a every single moment of life I reading the books see the fountain

title: Municipal Gardens - good place  with Exotic flowers and fountains
review: i found  the garden to be very good , with scenic views fountains , lakes, waterfall and beautiful flowers tendered with loving care by its people. The  people give garhwali clothes on hire for clicking photos with traditional outfits in the scenic location there is place of entertainment for kids with various rides with hot chicken magiie noddles to give you warmth in the chilly season

title: Good place to spend some time
review: Municipal garden is about 3 kilometers from the town, in Happy Vallet region of Mussoorie. Popularly it is also known as Company Bagh. This is a picnic spot for locals. Tourists come here to spend some time and relax. There are green lawns, a nursery,  artificial water fall, a fountain, and a small lake. Some restaurants and souvenir shops are also there. Tourists can take their photo in traditional dress available on rent here. Open from 9 am to 6 pm. Free entry.

title: a common picnic spot
review: Also known as company garden, its basically a picnic spot and more enjoyable along with kids. There are eatery shops and rides for kids. One can hire cycle rikshaw from library end in 300 rs return basis to go there or can go by hired taxi.

title: Company Garden is a major picnic location in Mussoorie.
review: Company Garden is a major picnic location in Mussoorie. It is situated at a distance of 3.5 km from Mussoorie Library Bus Stand. The garden has a lush green carpet of lawns and a fountain, which is located in its center. There is also an artificial lake with a small artificial waterfall. For the kids, the garden also has an amusement park with several adventurous rides. Boating facility is also available in the small lake at the garden.

title: "Superb garden"
review: Full of flowers, this garden is a nice place to see. If you are not habituated to the beauty of Mussoorie, and you are an outsider you will surely enjoy the visit!!!

title: Famous garden in Mussoorie
review: This garden is also called Company garden and you can comfortably visit there by hand rickshaw. The rickshaw person will charge on per person basis. The rates are displayed on the library end. We enjoyed our visit there.

title: Overrated place....
review: This is a nice garden to which a lot of useless extras have been added.... if you like -- shooting into balloons ; wax museum; lousy looking food... go for it... oh, the view is cool... but other than this... go some place else...

title: Also called Company Garden
review: Municipal garden is another name for company garden. I visited this garden with my family. Entry fee was 18 INR per person. Photography was free of cost. Visit this garden if you have small children. There are many rides including toy train for the children. The charges are also reasonable (20 INR per ride). K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum is also in the same garden.

title: it is company garden
review: i dont know why tripadvisior keeping this with 2 different names. municipal garden and company garden are same park. you can see my review on company garden. it is great.

title: Nice garden
review: Nice garden with variety of lowers, small waterfall, wax museum, paddle boat and photo ops etc.....some photographers might irritate you

title: Beautiful garden!!!
review: The municipal garden is greenery with lots of plants and variety of flower garden. Amazing small waterfall.

title: Good Picnic Spot
review: Very Nicely Maintained by MMA

title: Park with Artificial Water fall and lake
review: While the whole of Mussoorie is like a large garden with greenery around, the municipal garden in Mussoorie gives a picture of variety. There are so many varieties of trees and plants in this garden.  Also, it has a small wax museum, an artificial waterfall and a lake with boating facility. Visit in the evening to enjoy the cool breeze and freshness in the air.

title: Must See
review: The park is very beautiful and well maintained by the Mussoorie municipal authority. Neat and clean atmosphere nice fountains. The place is just about 3 km from the Library point. The different variety of local and exotic plants can be enjoyed. There was a lot of things for kids toy trains, boating, different types of jhulas etc. recommended this place for couple & Family.

title: iconic
review: As a public park it is very well maintained by the municipality, clean surroundings and awesome morning air

title: Nice Garden but not properly maintained
review: The Garden is in a nice location but not properly maintained. but people enjoy here far from the crowed.

title: Municipal Garden / Company Garden
review: This is the same Garden which is more popularly known by its old name i.e. Company Garden. A nice place to visit, more already shared under Company Garden.

title: Crowded but a nice garden
review: The garden is quite well maintained and you have an excellent glass house here with good collection of succulents. The Wax museum here is first of its type in India. The kids can enjoy boat rides, and indulge in other fun activities. Nice place for a romantic picnic.

title: Nice place
review: It is same as company garden.  we enjoyed lovely flowers and wax museum.  it is well maintained and nice place to visit with family.

title: Nice Garden
review: Company Garden is renamed as Municipal Garden. Its nice garden and well maintained. Wax museum is located in the garden. In peak season, it is over crowded.

title: it is company garden
review: company garden and municipal garden only name different. same place.it is away from city and much crowed. can spend 1 hour

title: Beautiful place
review: This is the erstwhile Company Gardens located near the IAS Academy in Mussoorie.

title: Good
review: Children are usually fond of visiting this small garden. Quite a few interesting activities for them

title: Old Company Gardens renamed Municipal Gardens
review: Municipal Gardens is the same old Company gardens. It is a good place away from the city to relax. I have given a long story under the company gardens

title: Lovely garden
review: The Municipal or Company gardens are a nature lovers delight.

title: Lovely place for Kids
review: Has a lot of activities for kids.... Play zone + Boating + Scary house etc. Restaurant inside is good and reasonable priced.

title: A very nice retreat
review: Gardens are always fun cause so much nature is around you. My pals were busy in taking selfies around the place and they had few rides as well. We took bull rides and it was hillarious although my pals did very bad ;).

title: Similar to Company Garden
review: Good place for kids to play & enjoy. Nothing much special to see and roam around.

title: Nice place but not well maintained !
review: Nice place o visit but not well kept. Parking is difficult even during the lean season.General upkeep is also average.

title: garden....
review: nothing much to do here except short boating in a small lake, some swings for the kids and a small park.

title: Not that great!
review: This is a very small garden area.  I expected it to be more representative of plants in the region or something.  I would rather have spent my time going hiking or obtaining a better understanding of the area.

title: Company Garden
review: Also called Company Garden. Nice place for children. Good for photoshoot near the water falls. Nice place.

title: Worth for a short visit
review: The company garden is a good place for families with children. We visited the park in October.  The garden is well maintained.  There is a play area for kids.  There are a few cafeterias too.  At the entrance of the park there are some shops which sell fancy items and toys.  I had my Mussoorie shoping from one of these shops.  Any time of the day is suitable for visiting there. There are enough trees and plants that provide lush greenery in the area. Another fact to keep in mind is that if you are running short of time and have other spots to visit,  better you skip this park.

title: Well Maintained Garden
review: It is good for short visit with family. It has boating facility and it also has play area for children. Its good to sit and relax here.

title: Good for kids
review: Nice place to see with nice collection flowers . Basically for Kids with some options for rides & artificial waterfall .

title: It is a Treat to be there
review: It is a Treat to be there

title: Awesome place
review: This is where children will enjoy more then elders. They have good number of trees, flowers and other things for children to enjoy. Fountain in its major attarction though at this time it was not working for somereason

title: Nice garden
review: Very nice garden.full of flowers.good to visit for garden enthusiasts.the have maintained the garden well.must be privately managed

title: Nice garden
review: The Municipal garden is a nice place to spend some time. The garden is full of trees, plants and flowers of different varieties. There is an artificial waterfall, water fountains and a nursery in the garden.

title: Amazing garden
review: Also known as company garden. Lots n lots of flowers with lots of greenry. Be ready with camera to shoot unforgettable clips.

title: Nice Garden.
review: To reach the garden you have to take a cycle rickshaw, less that 30 mins journey, costs INR 300( for an hour of stay at the garden). If you are on your own vehicle then there is no time problem.

title: Great Picknik Point in Mussoorie!
review: I visited recently with my family here and was amazed about the maintainence of the garden and variety of entertainments. There is wax meuseum, swing rides, waterfall, fountains, boat ride, awesome food... what not! A must visit if you go to Mussoorie!

title: Nice place to spend sometime
review: You want to grab a bite, pump some fresh air to your lungs, capture some beautiful flowers, pose like a model that's the right place. Beautiful flowers, greenery, bonfire and food all you can have at this place.

title: A nice Garden
review: One of the nice gardens in Mussorie. the flowers over here are nice and makes the garden look very pretty

title: lovely
review: we enjoyed our trip here as a time out from all the walking up and down the mall. its the way the british spent time when they had their contingents up in this tiny hill town

title: Just another name for Company Garden !
review: Read the reviews given for company garden , as it is the same place . But do not know why another name has been added.

title: A huge garden
review: The municipal garden is also known as the company bagh or garden. Its a huge garden with fountains and it also has a small pond for battle boating. The shikara ride option is often not available. Its good for kids.

title: It can be skipped
review: We visited this place while returning from Kempty falls. Not a must visit place. A fountain and an artificial fall. There are many other places to sit and admire the scenic beauty in mussoorie.

title: Good place
review: This is a very good place in Mussorri. Natural place is prepared with the help of different thing. So many beautiful things like water fall, flowers, boating, garden, poly house, lake, etc. Totally enjoyed in the garden with a natural environment. I like that place in the garden with the location of different things

title: Very nice place
review: Has good attractions for kids with plenty of rides available. the rate is also affordable.

title: Nice place
review: The rate is affordable but the problem is lack of transportation.  So many beautiful things like water fall, flowers, boating, garden, poly house, lake, etc. you can see there.

title: KIDS' Paradise
review: Your visit to Mussoorie would be incomplete without an outing to Company Garden a.k.a. Municipal Garden.There is so much fun for Kids and so much of activity for grown ups.

title: good place
review: its one of the good place for the children and the families to roam around. and enjoy the various activities

title: Scenic and Beatuiful place with lot to offer specially if with kids.
review: Swings, rides, boating, water fall good eating joints... This place is very near to mall road and must go if travelling with kids and family.  You can get some good click of the garden with variety of flower to offer.  a small water fall.  You can easily reach there by rickshaw its just 5 kms from mall road.  The best part is the charges for commuting to and fro and for waiting is fixed so not to worry about the negotiation.  Your kids can enjoy with some swings  and a small boating ride as well.  Even the pricing inside the park is quite fair easy on pocket.  Good stalls to eat and to relax in greenry.

title: Not very special, but good place to be
review: Its a very good park in the middle of the city, you can spent some good time in the park with your loved ones, this is close to city and the auto might charge you close to 50 per person.

title: The Company Garden
review: This is the Company Garden set up by the British in the Mussorie Valley. The place is landscaped by lush green grasses and is surrounded by fir and pine trees

title: Peace at its best
review: I started from my hotel near mall road and asking the localites since the weather was so good, decided to take a walk. For non-walkers you have the option of mini-vans moving and rickshaw.

title: or Company Garden or Botancal Garden
review: Well worth a cycle ricksaw ride from Library Bazaar.

title: beautiful garden
review: Wel maintained garden by the musoorie municipal authority . Neat and clean atmosphere nice fountains.

title: Very nice
review: A very well maintained garden with some exquisite plant varieties. A wonderful place for photo enthusiasts

title: Pretty
review: If you have time on your hands during your Mussourie trip take a trip to the Municipal Gardens. As usual an entry tax is involved around Rs 50-100 per vehicle and a small entry fee. But the garden is nicely laid out and well maintained making a visit worthwhile

title: Beautiful Garden
review: Its a beautiful garden for  tourist as people travelling to north can see the big size and bright flowers which is difficult at sea side.

title: Very Beautiful.
review: Beautiful garden with lush green grass having lot many flowers in the garden. Worth spending time there.

title: company bagh
review: the garden is also known as company bagh or company garden and is good one for kids to enjoy. a small boating is also there.

title: A complete Package
review: A lot of rides and games for people of all ages. A mini lake with boating. A mini waterfall. well laid out food courts and restaurants. large spaces for relaxation. The kids will love it. A complete package.

title: Company garden
review: Its newly built again now with a good restaurant and a small artificial waterfall. Nice place for a time pass with kids. Popularly known as company garden

title: small but good
review: this is small garden but well maintained and beautiful. one can spend with family for few hours. i would recommend this place.

title: Beautiful  small Garden
review: The place is just about 3 km from the Library point. You can go by rickshaw and very near to IAS training Acadaemy.

title: Its Company Garden
review: its is nothing but another name for company garden and as told a very good place with abundant natural beauty

title: Just okay
review: Not that great. Few good flowers and a cute little waterfall which is nice. Boating is worth a laugh..the pool ends before it starts. If you have extra time during your trip, you may visit.

title: Company garden
review: Who so ever wants to see the beauty of this place, come here in the morning time. The cool morning breeze, mixed with pine scent n fragrance of flower, mist n smell of mist. It's amazing, if u like these kind of things.

title: Nice Place to visit
review: there is nothing very special about, but you can visit if in mussoorie it's just another place to visit

title: PLACE FOR KIDS AND GROWN UPS
review: A kids paradise as it has all of swings a giant wheel snacks corner music and dhabhas in it and it is centrally located

title: Worth couple of hours
review: nice for passing a couple of hours, I personally love the flower show. There is a very reasonable entrance fee.

title: had a good time
review: our whole family went there..spend about couple of hours ,,had a good time ..the water falls is amazing ..there is one restraunt aswell close by ..the garden was decent too..

title: away from the crowd for some greenry
review: There is a reason why the title is so worded. With private vehicles being allowed in the town , half the time you are busy avoiding vehicles and the zooming bikers. With immense repair / construction work currently on , Mussoorie is a far cry from an idle vacation spot , except for the difference in  temperature vis a vis the plains. So this garden offers serenity to some extent and being amidst greenry. This was in April . To think of the status in May and June , when the vacations would be in full swing.

title: Alluring Flora
review: Was enchanted by a number of flower which are rare to be seen.Its a very good place

title: A must see
review: This is majorly called as Company Garden. Approx 5-6 Km from Library Bazaar Road. It has beautiful flowers and an artificial water fall too. A must visit. There is an entry fee of Rs. 18 per person and it's open till 7 pm during summers and till 6 pm during winters. Don't pluck or touch flowers there is a fine of Rs. 500 for doing that.

title: A good place to spend few hours
review: A good place for kids, I visited with my twin kids who were enjoyed very much after spending few hours in Kmepty Fall. Small place artificially constructed but good one.

title: A Good Place to spend Couple Of Hourss
review: This is a Small and beautiful garden not far from Mall-the main attraction in Mussouri. There is well made artificial Waterfall and also many activities to keep the kids happy and Engaged.The Garden has good collection of Flowers. The Vendors are a distraction. . There is an entry fee for this garden.

title: If you dont like typical tourist places, you may avoid it
review: This place is mostly for typical tourists and rowdy crowd. People making lots of noise, throwing around wrappers and unruly kids. Go to Dhanolti instead if you love quaint places.

title: BREATH OF FRESH AIR
review: Beautiful garden with colourful flowers and nice waterfall.Lake had boating facility and green house had nice flowers.Valley view from lake was also brilliant.Food in food court was nice and reasonably priced with lot of variety.Walk from zero point to company bagh reminded of old world charm.Only downside was pestering of photographers.

title: romantic
review: me and my husband always visit here when coming to mussoorie.

title: non-sense staff
review: staff has no manners to speak with tourists. No senior was there to lister any complaint. there was no proper place to relax. sitting on grass not allowed but not written anywhere except security staff who speak rudely.

title: Cool attraction and colourful place
review: Cool attraction. High car parking charges of Rs 100. Garden clean and nice. More flowers required. Lot of food parks, whose staff keep on disturbing you. Also many vendors for photograph clicking also disturb your visit. These vendors and restaurants need to be regulated by the authorities so that a visitor could involve more with the nature. Comparing with Ooty botanical garden, area is quite small here and flowers variety is also less. A lot of scope of improvement.

title: Terrible condition
review: Would not suggest anyone to visit this place. All the trees and plants there are in poor condition. Staff and shopkeepers are very rude and will charge almost double for all the things.

title: Best Place to Relax after Sightseeing in Evening
review: After we returned from a Long tiring travel from Lal Tibba and other places in the evening our Taxi driver took us to Municipal Garden where Kids enjoyed playing and we relaxed ourselves.

title: Visit one time atleast
review: Very beautiful and calm place. a small fish muesuem is there. Yon can enjoy horse ride from here to suicide point.

title: Very Cool Municipal Garden
review: The garden with cool breeze and we got very difficult to stay in the garden, because there is not sun light on the garden and a shadow of hill. the temperature was around 6 degrees

title: Average location in summers..good in winters
review: This is simple park.As the heat builds up in summer,this becomes a terrible place as you do not find many trees.But the scenario changes during the winters when after a snowfall the whole place is covered beautifully by snow.

title: Company garden was a disappointment
review: went there through rickshaw (man-pulled)..very costly.

title: commercial park
review: i found this park so charming for childrens as they have lots of things to play for .i like the unique giant wheel ride as local boys runs it by their hands and legs classicthey are so experience

title: Disappointing
review: Heavily crowded and commercialized place. Good collection of flowers in the garden/nursery. Nothing else to speak of. Food available is ordinary.

title: What was once a beautiful place has been killed to become a water park
review: The falls is gone ! It is just a water park with so many shops around. You won't be able to see the falls as you approach by road only concrete buildings. The place has no charm at all !

title: Loved it, good place for family.
review: The place is well maintained and good for children. My son really enjoyed running around in there. There are also a couple of rides for children that they would enjoy. One can spend 2-3 hours in there with family.

title: FOOD COURT IS THE BEST PART
review: Nice and calm ambience.You would love the place when you just feel like being what you are and with whom you are.

title: Nice Place
review: A really nice place to be in mussoorie, my kids enjoyed the rides there and there is a great collection of flowers from their nursery, but strongly recommend to avoid any kind of food there the food all the restaurents offer there is pathetic, specially the food court never ever try anything there the even don't know the "F" of food.

title: a good pass time during day
review: In addition to beautiful flowers, boating in artificial lake, swings, cafe etc gives full time of enjoyment.

title: Wonderful Garden with varieties of flowers and plants.
review: Superb garden, must visit once if you stay in mussoorie, good variety of flowers, plants, cactus and many more, nice artificial water fall, boating area to enjoy with kids, food court with tasty foods.

title: Waste of time!
review: Seriously, this "garden" is just an oversized home garden that they've turned into a tiny theme park for kids.  So not impressed.  Go for a walk in Landour instead.

title: Methodically Arranged Flower Garden
review: It’s basically a garden full of methodically arranged flowers. A picnic place to just relax with kids but gets overcrowded on weekends. Whole of delhi seemed to be there, complete waste of time, won’t like to visit again.

title: Good place to spend some time
review: Municipal garden in Happy Vallet region of Mussoorie is also known as Company Bagh. Families and tourists go here for picnic and spending some time. The garden has green lawns, a nursery having pretty plants, artificial water fall, a fountain, and a small lake. Some restaurants and souvenir shops are also there. Tourists can take their photo in traditional dress available on rent here.

title: Company or Municipal?
review: Ok I'm not sure whether it was the Municipal or Company Garden I visited but it was well laid out, it was fun watching the female gardeners at work, and the flowers were very impressive

title: Excellent!
review: More than the garden itself, it is the trip on the cycle rickshaw for Rs. 260 (to and fro) from the Mall Road that is charming. But even the artificially created garden with exquisite flowers, waterfall and the small boating place is worth visiting.

title: Interesting place, lots to do, with a good food court
review: The food court is neat and clean and has a very wide variety of food. There are lots of small activities and rides for the kds besides the souvenir shops.  Worth a visit

title: Average garden
review: Company bagh and municipal garden are same places.

title: Well maintained garden
review: Nice place for a picnic. The garden is well maintained and there is a good food court inside. Good place to relax and unwind.

title: Too crowdy not worth
review: I'd say that Mussorie has better options than waste your time here. However, if you are a on a leisurely trip may be 5 days or more you may spend a few hours here. I was on a fast trip so kinda got out early.

title: One place to see in Missouri
review: Poor maintenance. May be after heavy rain but time to spend and have some fun and food and enjoy. Take some photos around the flowers. We didn't like. Costing Rs.18 per person but not enough to see there.

title: Good place to hang around
review: Good place for lunch & loiter around. Lots of flowers & plants which makes the place inspiring & loving. Perfect picnic spot with swings for kids.

title: kafi achhi jagah thi ..what a nice place to see..
review: it was a lovely place ...very spritual place..mahol kafi dharmik ho gaya that thodi der...cloudy ..windy...n peaceful place..to much crowed was there..every one was enloying a lot ..there with there family..our team was also enjoying a lot there.....i would say just wow..wow...wow...n wow..

title: A Garden to visit in Winters...full of flowers of all kind and sizes.
review: The range of flowers very systematically displayed.
